mapper.select: SELECT s.stadium, rg.gametime, ms.d_status, ms.amount FROM rank_game rg INNER JOIN stadium_info s ON rg.st_no = s.st_no INNER JOIN m_settlement ms ON rg.no = ms.no ORDER BY rg.gametime desc
SELECT SUM(ms.amount) FROM rank_game rg INNER JOIN stadium_info s ON rg.st_no = s.st_no INNER JOIN m_settlement ms ON rg.no = ms.no WHERE ms.d_status = 1
SELECT SUM(ms.amount) FROM rank_game rg INNER JOIN stadium_info s ON rg.st_no = s.st_no INNER JOIN m_settlement ms ON rg.no = ms.no WHERE ms.d_status = 0
